Received: from    (Ghana Telecom ADSL) 

Compliment of the season, greetings in the name of our lord and saviour Jesus Christ. I am sending this proposal based on faith and trust so, i want you to keep it confidential.

I am Dr. Clinton Kamara, representing kamaplus consultancy services (GH) Ltd a consulting firm based in Accra Ghana. We have a client by name  who is a refugee from the DR.Congo, and this client deposited $20m USD and 200kg Gold Dust (22karat) with a security house for safe keeping but, he did not disclose the content to the management of the security house for security reasons. My Client have been looking for a reliable and credible investor to help him clear this fund and gold from the security house, and invest it outside Africa.

So, i have been mandated to source for a credible and reliable investor who is ready to invest the fund of this innocent boy or accept this young man as a partner. If you are intrested, i will want you to contact me as soon as possible. Please i want you to state in your reply if you want to invest this fund or you will want to go into partnership with this young man. Waiting to hear from you soon

Regards Clinton Kamara (Phd)

messages.body:
To Clinton Kamara:

OK, I'm interested. How old is this kid, and is he trustworthy? Is this money and gold dust legit, or is it the proceeds of some crime activities? Gold dust doesn't just magically appear, you know!

Did this kid steal it? Did he steal the money? I can't get involved with anybody who is not 100% honest and lawful. I have a name in this town, and I can't jeopardize it by openly doing business with crooks. I know you want confidentiality, but sometimes things get out of hand, and people find out what you're doing.

I'm sure you understand my position.

Dilbert H. Dowe

Received: from 

Dear Dilbert H. Dowe,

Thank you very much for your responds, i am very confident that this is indeed the Lords doing, God is truly at work and it is marvelous in our sight because, my client is a God fearing christian, he has always prayed for God to give him a foreign investor that is God fearing, reliable and trustworthy to help him and his consignment out of Africa and, behold, God has just fulfilled his promises for my client by giving him somebody like you to assist him, this is really a big testimony and my client will be very happy to hear this.

To be sincere with you my dear brother, my client have have a huge sum of money and gold dust he inherited from his late parents in a security company here in Ghana and he is desperately in need of a foreign investor to help him clear this consignment from the security house, move this fund and gold out of Africa while he join the foreign investor later to continue his education. My client's name is , his fund and gold have no criminal connection, he is a refugee from DR.Congo and he inherited this fund and gold dust 
from his late parents, to be precise, he got the money and the gold dust from his late father's strong room, his late father was a former Minister of Interior in the regime of the late President Kabila of DR.Congo so, i can assure you that my client is a responsible boy with decent family background but, unfortunately, he is the only surviving member of his family.

If it is true that you are intrested in assisting my client and his consignment from Africa then, we do not have any problem than to start this transaction immediately. What it will take is not much, you just have to clear this consignment from the security house that it has been deposited, we will get a good lawyer here that will prepare an agreement for you and our client and we can also help you get a diplomat that will deliver to you in your country without delay or transfer the fund to you in your nominated account if you prefer bank transfer..

The only conditions that we will give you are:
1. You have to invest my client's fund in any lucrative investment of your choice or make sure that the funds are safe for my client.
2. We want the gold sold and the money added to my client's propose investment.
3. very importantly, my client must join you in your country to continue his education 
4. My client is a devoted christian so, you must allow him grow in his christian faith when he join you in your country because, he is not safe in Africa since the killers of his late parents are after his life.

I believe my points are clear and understood so, get back to me immediately on how best you want this transaction done without further delay. In your reply, i will want you to send me your personal data, your full name, contact address, telephone/fax numbers and a scanned copy of your international passport or driver's license to enable us have an idea of who you are and open a file for you in our office for reference purpose. You can call me on +233 242 331 390 for more details.

Waiting to hear from you soon.

Regards, Dr.Clinton Kamara

messages.body:
To Clinton Kamara:

Can't you read? I asked you, how old is this kid?

First, you say he is an innocent boy. An "innocent boy" can be anywhere between the ages of 3 and 13. (Before age 3, a male child is a TODDLER.)

Then, you say he is a young man. A "young man" would be anywhere from 14 to 25. After age 25, he is a MAN.

SO, HOW OLD IS THIS KID?

I'll do right by this kid, and make sure he gets everything he deserves, and you, too.

Dilbert H. Dowe

messages.body:
To Clinton Kamara,
 sounds like a dream come true! I have been thinking and thinking about him, since I came in and read your mail this afternoon! I'll admit, I've done a little fantasizing about him, too. I'd love to have a picture of him, so I can put a face on the dream.

You're sure there's no girlfriend in his life? What about men friends? Is there going to be any problem if he comes to me? I don't want to get any hate mail from some spurned paramour.

I have to tell you, I'm really excited about having a young black man for my very own! I want you to assure him that he will be well taken care of, except for the times when I will have my fun with him. I will give him time to heal any scrapes or bruises, between the "sessions", and all doctor bills will be paid by me, of course.

Also, let me say that I am a professional, that I know what I am doing, and will not intentionally inflict any lasting damage on him. He will be well-fed, clothed, and housed in gracious surroundings, but not allowed off the premeses without supervision, of course.

We can't have him running around the countryside, not being able to communicate in English, you know! (You can assure me that he speaks English?)

Waiting to hear from you, and please address me by my nickname, Dill.

D. Dowe

messages.body:
To Clinton Kamara,

What is wrong with these pictures? You must think I am some kind of fool to think that those two guys are the same person! The first picture IN NO WAY resembles the picture on the guy on the registration card! What makes you think I will believe you, that both of these pictures are your Ahmed?

And where is the surname (Godwin) of the young man on the card? What's going on here? Are you trying to play games with me? I have better things to do than to play games.

I wonder if this is some sort of a prank by my employees in the shipping department? If it is, I hope you have another job lined up, because if and when I find out who's behind this, I will fire you! You know how I like the young boys, but this is going too far!!

Come clean with me, and maybe you can keep your job, but if I have to waste time finding out who's doing this, there will be heads rolling down the halls, believe me.

Dilbert H. Dowe

Dear Dill,

Thank you very much for your response, you are getting it all wrong here, nobody is trying to fool you, there is no game here, the two pictures are the same. I am too busy to play a game on the internet, i do not know you or know if you have any employee, i am just a consultant searching for an investor that can save the life of a young man and creat a better life for him.

Like i told you, the two pictures are the same person, take a more careful look at it, the picture in the registration card was when he just arrived the refugee camp here in Ghana, he was still looking very unkept, full of stress and so worried and frustrated with the loss of his parents and family. The other picture is his most recent picture because i insisted that we must send you his recent picture to give you a better impression of how he looks so, i do not want you to have any fear or doubt about Ahmed and this transaction because everything is real, we are not fake and be rest assured that you are in a very safe hand. To Clinton Kamara,

I hate to bring this up, but you have made a mistake! I didn't mean that I was going to buy young Ahmed clothes! What I meant was that I felt like I was selecting my preference, between the two boys in the pictures.

I was more interested in the lad with the round face, a very nice handsome and pleasant face for me to see all the time, and he will be next to me nearly all the time. Dill Dowe

messages.body:
Dear Darling boy Ahmed,

How thrilled I am to read your mail, waiting for me when I returned home from my horrifying stay at the hospital!

If you have a few moments, let me tell you what happened. When I wrote to you late last month, I knew that Dr. Doolittle had planned to "resect the Sensayuma Majoris", and he led me to believe that the surgery would be a serious one, and perhaps dangerous, too, but he said that I am in very good health, so there should not be complications.

Well, right off the bat, there were complications! Apparently, my heart stopped twice while under anesthesia, and I had to be resuscitated. Then I had to spend 2 weeks in Intensive Care, (my brother Wally, says it's "Expensive Care!") and a week and a half in a private room, and had to take therapy 3 times a day!

I just got out of the hospital this morning. I am recuperating at my home, taking the sun and becoming healthy again. You said you want a picture of me, so my brother Wally took one of me, in the backyard by the pool. I hope you like it.

Let me know how you are, dearest Ahmed, I want you to know that the thought of you waiting for me, gave me the will to live, and the strength I needed to get better. I'm not perfect yet, but I am very much better than I was!

Love to you, Dill

messages.body:
My dearest, darling boy Ahmed,

What a wonderful thing to read your loving and heartfelt words!! Now I know you truly and really love me, and I share your anxious anticipation of our life together. What fun we will have!

I have enlarged my photo for you, attached to this mail, so that you can see my love for you in my eyes, and I have shown your picture to all my friends, and they can't wait to meet you, they all say what a handsome lad you are, and one man said he wished you were his boy, that he would cover you with kisses, and hug you a thousand times a day!

I had to remind him that you will be my own personal love, and that he will be well advised to keep his bony fingers off you! Little does he know that I am a champion Judo wrestler, and even tried out for Sumo when I was in Japan, and I could crush him like a peanut if I want to!

My dearest Ahmed, I'm sorry I have to stop now, I must rest for a while. This typing and thinking of you, and planning what I will do with you, has made me more than a little excited, and the Dr. Doolittle says I must take it easy for a few more weeks.

I love you, Ahmed, and I am hoping for a wonderful, and exciting time for us, when you finally come into my arms.

Love, Dill

To Clinton Kamara,

I hope you are good and ashamed of yourself, for making me so upset at your Ghana money, making me think that you want me to send you pennies!

Ghana money, what a worthless medium of exchange. 1,000 to the dollar! It must cost more to print it, than it is worth! Who on earth would use such tiny money?

Don't make such terrible mistakes again. Ever. It is not necessary, and it is stupid to refer to something without explaining it. Many deals are lost because of this lack of thought. You almost lost this one.

Dill
